meanings.sent1: The flimsiest excuse couldn't convince anyone.
meanings.sent2: The paper was so flimsy that it tore easily.
meanings.sent3: The flimsiest umbrella couldn't withstand a light breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her argument was as flimsy as a house of cards.
meanings.sent5: The flimsiest thread held the fragile ornament together.

meanings.sent1: He wore the flimsiest shirt that tore with a gentle tug.
meanings.sent2: The flimsiest fabric couldn't withstand rough handling.
meanings.sent3: The flimsiest tissue tore at the lightest touch.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt as flimsy as a delicate piece of lace.
meanings.sent5: The flimsiest paper crumpled at the slightest pressure.

meanings.sent1: The flimsiest chair wobbled under his weight.
meanings.sent2: The flimsiest structure collapsed with a gentle push.
meanings.sent3: The flimsiest jelly wiggled on the plate.
meanings.sent4: His promise was as flimsy as a thin sheet of ice.
meanings.sent5: The flimsiest rope snapped under the lightest strain.
